meanings.definition: Combining or coordinating diverse elements into a whole.
meanings.sent1: The integrative approach brought together various ideas to form a complete solution.
meanings.sent2: The team used an integrative strategy to merge different perspectives into a cohesive plan.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were integrative, fitting perfectly to create a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: Her integrative mindset wove together different thoughts like threads in a tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The integrative nature of the project made it successful by blending different skills harmoniously.
